TextView.android:text: 1) Are you at present in GOOD health? If No, Please provide details below
2) During the last one year, has there been any increase/decrease in your weight over 5 Kilograms.If yes, please provide full details in the space below
3) Since the Date of Proposal of this policy
a) Have you suffered from any illness / disease requiring treatment for 3 or more days? If yes, give full details

b) Do you plan or have been advised to undergo any surgery or hospitalization or visit to doctor or practitioner for any physical, mental or emotional condition, injury, or sickness in near future. If yes, please provide details in the space below

EditText.android:hint: Enter Operation, Accident or Injury details

TextView.android:text: c) In the last 5 year, apart from minor ailments like cough/cold etc, have you received any treatment under doctorâ€™s consultation and /or undergone any major surgery and/or been hospitalized and/or undergone major investigations like CT/MRI scan, Angiogram, Endoscopy, Biopsy etc? If yes, please provide full details in the space below
Medical examinations including but not limited to ECG, X-Ray, CT scan / MRI, Blood/Urine / Stool tests or Examinations?

4) Do you suffer from or have ever suffered from: Raised Blood sugar, Diabetes mellitus, high blood pressure, Disease of heart, lung, kidney, Liver, thyroid, brain/nervous system, bone/joint/spine, Genitourinary tract, any part of the body or blood disorder, digestive disorder, Gynaecological disorder, Psychiatric disorder, HIV/AIDS and/or cancer/tumour of any part of the body. If yes, please provide full details in the space below

5) Has any of your proposals for life insurance, critical illness or health insurance, ever been denied, declined, rejected, postponed or accepted with extra premium due to health or lifestyle reason If yes, please provide full details in the space below

6) Are you exposed to any special hazard associated with your occupation (e.g. chemical factory, mines, explosives, corrosives, combative duties, oil exploration, high sea voyage etc.) which may render you susceptible to injuries or illnesses? If Yes, please provide details in the occupation questionnaire and submit along with this declaration.
7) Are you a â€œPolitically Exposed Personâ€ (PEP) or a close relative of PEP?

PEPs are individuals who are or have been entrusted with prominent public functions, i.e. heads / ministers of central / state govt., senior politicians, senior govt, judicial or military officials, senior executives of govt. companies, important political party officials, immediate family member of above persons (would include spouse, parents, siblings, children, spouses parents or siblings and close associates of PEPs
If yes, give full details. If No, in case of change in your PEP status in future, you shall inform SBI Life of such change
8) History of criminal proceedings, FIR or conviction.
a) Has any FIR or Criminal Complaint ever been registered or lodged against you? If yes, give full details
b) Have there been any Criminal proceedings initiated against you either in the past or in the present? If yes, give full details
c) Do you have any history of conviction under any criminal proceedings in India or abroad? If yes, give full details

9) Do you take part in or have you any intention of taking part in any hazardous sports, hobbies, activities or pursuits, for example mountaineering, Diving, racing or aviation other than as a fare paying passenger, that could be dangerous in any way? If yes, give full details
10) a) Do you consume any of the following?
Kind of alcohol i.e whisky, beer, etc

EditText.android:hint: Kind of alcohol i.e whisky, beer, etc
Enter Quantity per week in ml

TextView.android:text: b) If you have quit any of the above in the last 1 year, kindly provide details

EditText.android:hint: Enter Consumption Quit details if any

TextView.android:text: 11)For Female Lives Only: \n\n a) Are you presently pregnant?

b) Have you ever suffered from or have undergone any investigations or treatment for any gynecological problems related to cervix, uterus, ovaries, breast, breast lump/cyst etc or undergone surgical procedure like hysterectomy
Space for providing details pertaining to the above questions. If required, please use an additional sheet of paper and attach
1.Have you visited any foreign country after 1.1.2020,then please answer the following
1.4 If you have been screened at the airport please provide copy of report provided
2 Have you been tested for COVID-19. If yes, all the reports of same till date
3 Please confirm if either of the following is applicable to you
3.1 Kept in home quarantine anytime (till date) since1.1.2020
3.2 Kept under observation anytime (till date) since1.1.2020
3.3 Kept in home isolation/self isolation anytime (till date)since 1.1.2020
4 Do you plan to travel to any foreign countries in next 6 months

5 Have you or your immediate family members/co-habitants suffered from any signs and symptoms of flu(cough, cold, fever more than 05 days) since 1.1.2020(whether any medical consultation taken or not)?
6 Have you or your immediate family members undergoneor been advised to undergo any test/investigations orhospitalized for observation or treatment in past 2 monthsfor respiratory symptoms?
7 Have you or any of your immediate familymembers/cohabitants come in contact with suspected orconfirmed cases of coronavirus
DECLARATION WHEN THE DGH IS FILLED BY A PERSON OTHER THAN THE PROPOSER /POLICYHOLDER / MEMBER INSURED IN VERNACULAR LANGUAGE/ PROPOSER /POLICYHOLDER / MEMBER INSURED IS ILLITERATE
